name: Chicken Hazari Kabab Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken Hazari Kabab Recipe: Chicken boneless Â½ kg Egg 1 Cheddar cheese grated3 tbsp Green chilies grinded 1 tbsp Cream 3 tbsp Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Salt 1 tsp All spice 1 tsp Corn flour 3 tbsp Onion rings for garnishing Tomato rings for garnishing
instructions: Marinate chicken with all the given ingredients for 2 hours Now put on skewers, bake on 180 D for 25 mins, and give dum of coal. Serve garnished with onion and tomato slices.
